languages.text: "Сомневаюсь. Мастифам нужны команды. В любом случае, "Бессердечный" ваш, как мы и договаривались".
"I doubt it. Cyber-mastiffs require commands. Either way, the Heartless is now yours, as agreed."
languages.original_text: "Сомневаюсь. Мастифам нужны команды. В любом случае, "Бессердечный" ваш, как мы и договаривались".

traits.locale_text: "I doubt it. Cyber-mastiffs require commands. Either way, the Heartless is now yours, as agreed."
"I doubt it. Cyber-mastiffs require commands. Either way, the Heartless is now yours, as agreed."
"I doubt it. Cyber-mastiffs require commands. Either way, the Heartless is now yours, as agreed."
"I doubt it. Cyber-mastiffs require commands. Either way, the Heartless is now yours, as agreed."
"I doubt it. Cyber-mastiffs require commands. Either way, the Heartless is now yours, as agreed."
"I doubt it. Cyber-mastiffs require commands. Either way, the Heartless is now yours, as agreed."

languages.text: «Lo dudo. Los cibermastines necesitan órdenes. En cualquier caso, la Desalmada es suya, como acordamos».
languages.original_text: "I doubt it. Cyber-mastiffs require commands. Either way, the Heartless is now yours, as agreed."

traits.locale_text: «Lo dudo. Los cibermastines necesitan órdenes. En cualquier caso, la Desalmada es suya, como acordamos».

languages.text: “恐怕未必，生化獒犬需要主人下命令。不过无论怎样，按照约定，无心号现在归你所有。”
languages.original_text: "I doubt it. Cyber-mastiffs require commands. Either way, the Heartless is now yours, as agreed."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕未必，生化獒犬需要主人下命令。不过无论怎样，按照约定，无心号现在归你所有。”

languages.text: « J'en doute. Les cyber-mastiffs n'agissent que sur commande. Quoi qu'il en soit, le Sans-Cœur est à vous, comme convenu. »
languages.original_text: "I doubt it. Cyber-mastiffs require commands. Either way, the Heartless is now yours, as agreed."

traits.locale_text: « J'en doute. Les cyber-mastiffs n'agissent que sur commande. Quoi qu'il en soit, le Sans-Cœur est à vous, comme convenu. »

languages.text: 「どうでしょうか。サイバーマスチフにはコマンドが必要です。どちらにせよ、約束したとおり、ハートレスは今あなたのものです」
languages.original_text: "I doubt it. Cyber-mastiffs require commands. Either way, the Heartless is now yours, as agreed."

traits.locale_text: 「どうでしょうか。サイバーマスチフにはコマンドが必要です。どちらにせよ、約束したとおり、ハートレスは今あなたのものです」

languages.text: "Sanmam. Siber mastifler komutlara itaat eder. Her hâlükârda Taşkalp, anlaştığımız üzere artık sizindir."
languages.original_text: "I doubt it. Cyber-mastiffs require commands. Either way, the Heartless is now yours, as agreed."

traits.locale_text: "Sanmam. Siber mastifler komutlara itaat eder. Her hâlükârda Taşkalp, anlaştığımız üzere artık sizindir."

languages.text: "Das bezweifle ich. Cyber-Mastiffs brauchen Befehle. Jedenfalls gehört die Heartless nun wie vereinbart Euch."
languages.original_text: "I doubt it. Cyber-mastiffs require commands. Either way, the Heartless is now yours, as agreed."

traits.locale_text: "Das bezweifle ich. Cyber-Mastiffs brauchen Befehle. Jedenfalls gehört die Heartless nun wie vereinbart Euch."
